Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI is more accessible than my teacher: it can be accessed whenever and immediately, however my teacher is a specialist: I understand that my teacher marks, specialises in and understands the content so I trust their opinion more. I can use AI for tasks that reduce the time I am able to spend learning, such as spelling and grammar checking or note summarising or formatting

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
I don't take AI feedback personally, I feel it is subjective.
I hold my teacher's feedback in an entirely different light, wanting them to approve and feeling anxious or disappointed when they don't

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
